# What it does 


+ Useful you to see information on the structure of any. It is somewhat useful for datasets.
  
 
# Demo code 

```{r}
str(iris)
```
  
 
# Usefull stuff 

+ The output an be voluminous.
```{r eval=FALSE}
str(
  lm(height~weight, data= women)
)
```
+ [`glimpse()`]{.blue} is often more useful.
